name: Gigmaker
description:
Design and build concert stages from modular elements and blocks. Upload your music, set up lighting, equipment and your favorite artists.



Create musicians in the character editor. Set the animations and instruments you like.



Make your own character skins from scratch or edit existing skins using editor.
Skins are compatible with those of the popular game. Just upload them to Gigmaker.



Gigmaker allows you to make your own gigs from scratch and share it with your friends.
Create lasting memories with memorable lighting and music.
